title: To all the people who feed but flame the non-feeders if they make a tiny mistake
body:
I hate you

That is all

replies.body:
"It's not my fault we lost even tho I'm 0/23, Nid missed a spear 20 minutes ago"
"I was using it to check a bush"
"Ya and it didn't hit anyone gg uninstall noob"

Conversation yesterday:

{{champion:51}} Nasus you idiot, how come you didn't get that tower?
{{champion:75}} My apologies, I got 5 man ganked and couldn't quite get that tower
{{champion:51}} You scrub
{{champion:75}} I'm sorry, but when there's a 8/0 Vayne along with a 5/0 Katarina, there's quite frankly not much I can do
{{champion:51}} LMAO, no wonder you're Gold 2
{{champion:75}} Erm...I'm sorry but I'm not 0/5 like you
{{champion:51}} You're 5/5, just as bad

5/5 is actually worse than 0/5, in terms of gold you are giving to the enemy team >.>
So if anything, that Nasus is feeding more than Cait in an odd way

How do you know? You dont know if Nasus gave someone a shutdown, you dont know if Nasus shutdown 5 people and got 2500 gold as opposed to the 1500 he gave, maybe he even died all 5 times in a row and gave less than that and made over 1k gold in gains from being 5/5. There's no way to tell. But i can tell you for certain 0/5 has not gained any gold for your team and has given gold to the enemy team.

Either way, in terms of gold being given to enemies, he has given more.
By 5 deaths, cait is hardly worth any gold.
I don't want to continue this discussion, because I can see my reply wasn't very well recieved.

It wasn't very well received because it was simply wrong. That's not a fault on our end. In addition to all that's been said, don't forget the gold that Nasus got for himself. A hell of a lot more than Cait has.

I just find it odd that people say the exact same thing Im saying in a post, and get in the Best section.
But now that I try to explain it, I get downvoted.
Maybe I just explained it wrong, or maybe it wasn't said properly.
Either way, I wont delete the post, as it provides some valuable info on what isn't right >.>

Just because you give more gold doesn't mean you fed more. It's more about the difference between gold earned and gold given. In this instance, Nasus is at least around 1:1. Cait is literally 0:1. Cait's a blatant feeder.
He COULD have given more. There is no way to tell from 5/5, so stop assuming. That was what he was trying to correct you on.

Perhaps some more context:

I was 5/5, but I ended the game 12/7 while Cait was 1/12 by the end of the game. I killed off 5 towers alone and an inhibitor while Cait continued to E INTO the enemy team when she got dove. Logic: Try to kill enemy Vayne or Kat

We lost unfortunately, because while I could 2-shot their Vayne or Kat, I couldnt do much else. Best I could do was take out towers and inhibitors because even when behind, my team's Xerath and Caitlyn at least had decent waveclear

nope. 0/5 is useless, 5/5 is useful.

0/5 going to be catching up the rest of the game, 5/5 is already caught up and relevant.

Sure cait has given like 200 less gold overall(it's not much of a difference) , but she's useless and will have no impact for awhile.

https://youtu.be/QBgKVQJlodg 

You'd enjoy this video.

Well, considering that League of Legends is rated T for teen, I would expect some children to be playing this game.

Also, why is everyone so competitive about a Free to Play, nation wide, game. What happened to just playing for fun? If I win, I wish I'd earn more IP. If I lost, why do I still earn 4/5 of what I would earn if I'd win?

> [{quoted}](name=Rew711,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=4rVP2EZ4,comment-id=00060001,timestamp=2015-06-28T17:13:29.684+0000)
>
> Well, considering that League of Legends is rated T for teen, I would expect some children to be playing this game.
> 
> Also, why is everyone so competitive about a Free to Play, nation wide, game. What happened to just playing for fun? If I win, I wish I'd earn more IP. If I lost, why do I still earn 4/5 of what I would earn if I'd win?

Cuz ranked IS competitive play. You dont like it play normals.
Wasn't talking about Ranked but have fun with that.

> [{quoted}](name=OuTopos,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=4rVP2EZ4,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2015-06-28T12:36:03.829+0000)
>
> https://youtu.be/QBgKVQJlodg 
> 
> You'd enjoy this video.

i do not even know how to reply to this brain damaging idiocy

This guy's an ass. Wow.
I wanna break his hands.

Earlier today (yesterday)

about 15 minutes into game

{{champion:254}} OMG how come nobody bot helped me? Reksai was there
{{champion:57}} [support] Vi, we were too far, best to just push the tower since we would not have made it in time
{{champion:254}} Well, It would have been best to try to help.
{{champion:57}} There was literally no way we'd make it to your red from bot outer turret [we're on blue side] in 6 seconds. 
{{champion:254}} But you should know she keeps invading.
{{champion:57}} The buy some wards and ward your Jg, check my yi game from last game and you'd see all those wards i bought were in my jungle
{{champion:254}} HOW COME YOU DONT HAVE A SIGHT STONE  YET?
{{champion:57}} Are you serious? press tab every now and again you'd know ive been buying 2 wards on every back and a pink. Warding isnt JUST my responsibility.
{{champion:254}}  [gets killed again somewhere near chicken raptors] OMG Maokai no sight stone.
{{champion:57}} are you serious? Even if I had mine finished i would not be warding your chicken raptors when we're actively trying to push bot and avoid getting ganked by the reksai you fed
{{champion:254}} Well maybe if you helped earlier
{{champion:57}} Again, if you wanted to stop reksai you should have warded the important places in your jg, then we could have formulated a plan and aptly reacted to collapsing on her. If we dont see her until she's on your face, what do you expect us to do?
{{champion:254}} I expect you to have sight stone.
{{champion:57}} I told you i had wards every backing including pinks.
{{champion:254}} THEN WHY ARE YOU BLAMING ME FOR FEEDING?
{{champion:57}}I didnt not mean to accuse you of anything, but your score is miserable the point is , I said if you're going to bitch at me because reksai is constantly in your jungle, at least have the courtesy to ward so we can stop her, before anything happens.
{{champion:254}} Why are you talking down to me? this is why you're in bronze, scrub
{{champion:57}} [currently has an over 52% winrate is is steadily climbing now. ] -_____________-

that vi never did upgrade her ward. She tried to get the enemy team to report me but they stepped up and told her how much id been warding to the point where i wound up turning a fight warding and counterwarding.

since she failed at trying to get me, she then targeted another teammate. needless to say, i gave up the argument, muted her, and we lost.

What a bitch, that Vi.

Sometimes, when I play Vi... I build a sightstone. With cinderhulk and her passive, I don't feel the difference! :D

I just see it.

from last game.

{{champion:12}} [ gets into a teamfight and engages perfectly. wq combo knocks up FOUR of the enemy team all of whom squishy backrows and zyra ult follows up.] they're now hurt before they even fight.

{{champion:39}} focuses Volibear, causing the team to turn around and do the same thing splitting me off from the team behind me. puts me out of range for kalista ult. team naturally dies because they misplayed by focusing volibear instead of the yi and ahri while they were cced.

{{champion:39}} OMG WHAT THE FUCK WAS ALISTAR DOING?

{{champion:12}} I completely engaged on their backrow perfectly, Zyra's ult even followed up, why the hell did you focus volibear?

{{champion:39}} YOUR JOB IS TO PEEL FOR ME.

{{champion:12}} I just knocked 4 of them up and started an ideal teamfight. im a tank, too. and the only full one on this team. it;s not my fault you didnt follow up on me and zyra's engage, to focus volibear.

{{champion:39}} but your job is to peel you stupid Git.

{{champion:12}} Look ok, it's not my problem if you dont know who and how to focus. Volibear hurts but he does much less dmg than that yi that killed you. maybe if you guys had focused on hard ccing him while i was in his face, instead of wasting all your abilities on volibear that wouldn'tve happened.

{{champion:39}} [all] report noob Alistar for not peeling for team.

{{champion:106}} You're the dumbass that targeted me, why should i report him?

{{champion:85}} what are you talking about? he engaged on all of us perfectly, you're the idiot that focused Volibear. you might have won that fight if you didnt.

i swear, some people

I love it when even the enemy team is on your side.

Dude, why did you put up with that for that long. After about 2-3 comments from her you should have just muted her. Think of all that time you spent arguing with them, when you could have just muted and played that game instead. You probably wasted minutes standing still typing to her, js.
Oh no, that was all while we were dead. then we tried something, lost and the game was over. team kept focusing volibear :/
I tend to buy Sightstone+Oracle's whenever I jungle. You can scare the hell out of your enemy jungler to the point where they wont invade anymore, because you have the whole damn thing warded.
Literally the last game i played. Lookin' at you, {{champion:23}} {{champion:53}} .
Even though i hate when a feeder does that, a "tiny" mistake can cost you the game.
Doesn't mean you give them ever living hell for it. They're still people you're playing with.

To all the players who flame/rage at others for the tiniest mistake they make:

Fuck you.

That is all.

______

Sorry,I had to get rid of the "Feed" part because it's just as annoying when the flamer isn't feeding.
{{champion:92}} : haha yeah I hate them too. WHY WONT ANYONE LOVE ME?????? {{item:3070}}
Preach
Too bad I only have one upvote

"Don't feed Darius."
"I can't help it, you didn't pint that he was gone, nor did you pint for us to be careful."
"Now he's fed. Uninstall noobs."
"You're a 1/20 Riven. You have been feeding all game. The only reason you got a kill is because he gave you a kill to be nice to us."

You COULD have said: "Riven, play safer please."

You COULD have said: "Riven, try helping other lanes."

And I'm even confused at who is saying what. Is Riven the one complaining about the fed Darius? Or what? Because I can't even tell.
